title: Vanessa Tsehaye
subtitle: URGENT: The Eritrean footballers have finally been relocated to a safe house. However, they do not have mattresses on the beds and scarce access to food. Continue putting pressure on @Refugees to urgently #ProtectFleeingFootballers by using the hashtag & tagging their account.pic.twitter.com/8Usii1A1wS

title: George Okoth-Obbo
subtitle: Hugely inspiring to learn about the targeted vocational training programmes of @Refugees partners WWDC and NAVTTC to provide skills to young #Afghan refugees and #Pakistani national counterparts alike meaningfully to build their lives + support themselves and their families.pic.twitter.com/ryLYZjV1Tk

title: Reset

title: koen leurs
subtitle: Under the careful guidance of Tristan Mattelart, editor of SI on Forced migration & media for the European Journal of Communication I wrote a research note exploring affective labor of young refugees’ transnational communicative practices. https://journals.sagepub.com/doi/full/10.1177/0267323119886166 … 1/4pic.twitter.com/EBcGmi4XQv
